Author: tulipsandmothballs
Text: All is well, you are loved. I repeat this sometimes. Over and over. It helps calm my anxiety enough to make a decision that isn’t self sabotaging. It won’t fix anything and certainly won’t help your job situation but it may help internally. Our teachers recently went on strike over pera and other things. As a mother of an elementary school student I support you and am sending love ❤️
